MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 29-NOV-2020 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:49pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repair work required to our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:15pm on 29th November 2020.
